description: Riot police fire tear gas as violence erupts during a Black Lives Matter protest in central Paris.
title: French police clash with anti-racism activists in Paris
title_page: French police clash with anti-racism activists in Paris - BBC News
maintext: In one recent case, police are accused of seriously wounding a 14-year-old boy when he was detained on suspicion of trying to steal a scooter in Bondy near Paris last month.
